    • getConfig

      @Deprecated(since="1.21.4", forRemoval=true) @NotNull public YamlConfiguration getConfig()
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      Server config options may be renamed or removed without notice. Prefer using existing API wherever possible, rather than directly reading from a server config.
      Returns:
      The server's spigot config.
      See Also:
      • Server.getServerConfig()

    • broadcast

      @Deprecated public void broadcast(@NotNull net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.BaseComponent... components)

      Sends an array of components as a single message to the player

    • restart

      @Deprecated(since="1.21.4", forRemoval=true) public void restart()
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      Use Server.restart() instead.
      Restart the server. If the server administrator has not configured restarting, the server will stop.
